title: Early Access
content: full release, Baldur's Gate 3 will have an even further revamped Character Creation System at the start of the game. This is both in terms of graphics, to match the general improvements the developers have made from Early Access, and also in terms of its content. As listed above, the Dragonborn and Half-Orc Races will be officially added when the game launches, along with the Subraces in Dragonborn's case. A new Subrace will also be added for the Dwarf to represent their Underdark-dwelling cousi
